attributes.action: Reduce MP's pay to the average income for citizens of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's seem to be able to pay themselves what ever they like. It would be better for the country if MP's were limited to the national average, as this would make them more liable to get the national average pay increased. Cbinet ministers should get 1.5 times the national average and the PM should get no more than twice the national average. There was a time when being an MP was a matter of duty and national service, not to line there own pockets

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
